summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new AI Safety Vision landing page and navigation. All landing page sections render correctly, navigation between / and /inspect routes works perfectly, and existing inspection tool functionality remains intact.

minor_issues.issue: CORS headers not fully configured in response
minor_issues.impact: No functional impact - API works correctly

passed_tests: Landing page loads correctly at / route
Hero CTA button with data-testid='hero-cta-button' navigates to /inspect
Navigation bar 'Start Inspection' button works perfectly
Features section displays all 6 feature cards correctly
How It Works section shows all 3 steps (Upload Photos, AI Analysis, Get Report)
What We Detect section shows all 4 violation categories
Final CTA button with data-testid='cta-start-inspection' navigates to /inspect
/inspect route shows the inspection tool correctly
Back button on /inspect navigates to landing page
Upload functionality works on /inspect page
Upload dropzone with data-testid='upload-dropzone' present and functional
Upload button with data-testid='upload-button' is clickable
Stats dashboard correctly hidden when no photos uploaded
Analysis gallery correctly hidden when no photos uploaded
Backend API /api/analyze endpoint still functional
Backend API /api/health endpoint working
Responsive design works on tablet (768x1024) viewport
Responsive design works on mobile (390x844) viewport
All navigation buttons visible across different screen sizes
Complete user journey from landing to inspection tool functional
All landing page sections (Features, How It Works, What We Detect) scroll and load properly

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all landing page and navigation features working perfectly)
success_percentage.overall: 95% (excellent functionality with only minor backend CORS improvement needed)
